user.name: user
user.columns: `user_id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`role` VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,`account` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,`password` VARCHAR(12) NOT NULL,`nickname` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`user_id`),UNIQUE INDEX `account_UNIQUE` (`account` ASC) VISIBLE,UNIQUE INDEX `user_id_UNIQUE` (`user_id` ASC) VISIBLE

product.name: product
product.columns: `product_id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`productNum` INT NOT NULL,`catagory` VARCHAR(12) NOT NULL,`productName`VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, `thumbnail` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,`price` INT NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`product_id`),UNIQUE INDEX `user_id_UNIQUE` (`product_id` ASC) VISIBLE,UNIQUE INDEX `thumbnail_UNIQUE` (`thumbnail` ASC) VISIBLE

productDetail.name: productDetail
productDetail.columns: `productNum` INT NOT NULL,`detail` VARCHAR(4000) NULL,`inventory` INT NOT NULL,`img` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`productNum`),UNIQUE INDEX `account_UNIQUE` (`productNum` ASC) VISIBLE,UNIQUE INDEX `img_UNIQUE` (`img` ASC) VISIBLE

cart.name: cart
cart.columns: `cart_id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`account` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,`item` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`cart_id`),UNIQUE INDEX `account_UNIQUE` (`account` ASC) VISIBLE

cart_item.name: cart_item
cart_item.columns: `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`cart_id` INT NOT NULL,`productNum` INT NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`id`),UNIQUE INDEX `account_UNIQUE` (`id` ASC) VISIBLE,UNIQUE INDEX `productNum_UNIQUE` (`productNum` ASC) VISIBLE

orderDetail.name: orderDetail
orderDetail.columns: `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`orderNum` INT NOT NULL,`productNum` INT NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`id`),UNIQUE INDEX `account_UNIQUE` (`productNum` ASC) VISIBLE

orderList.name: orderList
orderList.columns: `orderNum` INT NOT NULL,`account` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,`orderTime` DATETIME NOT NULL,`pay_status` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,`deliver_status` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,`order_amount` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,`sendName` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,`sendAdd` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,`payWay` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,`totalPrice` INT NOT NULL,UNIQUE INDEX `account_UNIQUE` (`orderNum` ASC) VISIBLE,PRIMARY KEY (`orderNum`)
